integrations_researched.name: Material-UI (MUI)

imports: import { Dialog, Fade, Grow, Slide, Zoom } from '@mui/material'

gotchas: TransitionComponent must be forwarded React component with proper ref handling
Combining multiple transitions (Fade + Grow) requires nested components
Must use forwardRef for custom transition components
Reduced motion should be respected via prefers-reduced-motion media query (already implemented in theme.ts)
Timeout values must match between parent and child transitions for smooth animations
